item.title: From 51 Days to 5: How Tavant's Agentic AI Transformed Legacy Mortgage Operations
item.description: A deep dive into how Tavant's TOUCHLESS platform achieved 77% cost reduction and 4.5x productivity gains in mortgage operationsâ€”the lessons for any legacy industry facing AI transformation.
